welcomeBalanceBegins: A more balanced, fulfilled life starts now.

joinInvitation: Create an account and begin the journey with us.

fields.name: Name
fields.mealsPerDay: How many meals do you usually eat per day?

form.name: Name
form.mealsPerDay: How many meals do you usually eat per day?
form.alcoholAmountLabel: How much do you usually drink?
form.alcoholAmount.light: Light (e.g., up to 4 alcohol units/week – like 1–2 glasses of wine)
form.alcoholAmount.moderate: Moderate (5–14 units/week – e.g., 2–6 drinks spread across the week)
form.alcoholAmount.heavy: Heavy (more than 14 units/week – frequent or large quantity consumption)

info.name: Enter your real name. E.g.: John.
info.dateOfBirth: Required for precise age, plan, and calorie calculations.
info.preferredLanguage: Your plan and system will be displayed in your chosen language.
info.goal: Your main goal: lose weight, gain muscle, improve well-being, etc.
info.profilePhotoUrl: You can upload a photo – it will be shown in your profile.
info.foodRestrictions: Diet, religion, or other restrictions. E.g.: vegan, gluten-free.
info.jobType: Type of work. E.g.: sedentary, physical, shift work.
info.workHoursPerDay: Average number of work hours per day. E.g.: 8.
info.workSchedule: Work schedule: regular, shift, early, flexible, etc.
info.wakeUpTime: What time do you usually wake up? E.g.: 06:30.
info.bedTime: When do you usually go to bed? E.g.: 22:30.
info.sleepHours: How many hours do you sleep per night? E.g.: 7.5.
info.mealsPerDay: This helps us understand your eating patterns and recommend better nutrition plans.
info.eatsOutOften: Tick if you often eat in cafes/restaurants.
info.gymMember: Tick if you have a gym membership.
info.physicalActivityLevel: Your activity level in daily life.
info.stepsPerDay: Average number of steps per day.
info.newActivitiesInterest: What would you like to try (e.g., yoga, running, swimming).
info.minutesPerWorkout: Average duration of one workout in minutes.
info.workoutsPerWeek: How many workouts per week would you like/can you do?
info.workoutLocation: Where do you usually work out? At home, gym, outdoors.
info.equipmentAvailable: Equipment available for training, e.g.: dumbbells, mat.
info.coffeePerDay: Average cups of coffee per day.
info.teaPerDay: Average cups of tea per day.
info.motivationLevel: From 1 to 10 — how motivated do you feel?
info.notifications: Would you like to receive email notifications about plan updates?
info.successDefinition: What does success mean to you?
info.smokes: Do you smoke? Choose the appropriate option.
info.alcohol: How often do you consume alcohol?
info.stressLevel: Rate your stress level from 1 to 10.
info.goalDeadline: When would you like to reach your goal?
info.wantsRestRecommendations: Tick if you want to receive rest advice.
info.accessLevel: Automatically assigned. Cannot be edited manually.
info.alcoholUsage: This helps us understand lifestyle factors.
info.alcoholAmount: Let us know your usual alcohol consumption for better recommendations.

bodyTypeInfo.ectomorph: Ectomorph: Naturally slim, has difficulty gaining weight and muscle mass. Fast metabolism.
bodyTypeInfo.mesomorph: Mesomorph: Naturally athletic, easily gains muscle mass, proportionate body structure.
bodyTypeInfo.endomorph: Endomorph: Tends to store fat easily, slower metabolism, rounder body shape, but can be strong.
bodyTypeInfo.unknown: Unknown: Not sure about your body type? Click 'Want to know' to read descriptions.

info.eatingHabitsTest: This is a short test that will help you assess your eating habits.
test.introText: Answer each question by choosing a number from 1 to 5, where 1 means 'strongly disagree' (never) and 5 means 'strongly agree' (always or very often). This test helps you see which areas of your eating habits are the strongest or weakest. This is important because an objective assessment helps you better understand your eating patterns and improve them.
test.thank_you: Thank you for completing the test!
test.q_plan_meals: I plan my meals in advance (e.g., weekly menu).
test.q_eat_regularly: I eat regularly at the same time every day.
test.q_late_eating: I often eat late in the evening or at night.
test.q_overeating: I often eat more than I planned because I don't feel full or just want more.
test.q_eat_vegetables: I eat vegetables at least once a day.
test.q_eat_fruits: I snack on fruits instead of sweets or chips.
test.q_cook_from_scratch: I cook food at home from scratch (e.g., from fresh ingredients).
test.q_try_healthy_recipes: I like to experiment with new, healthier recipes (e.g., salads, vegetable dishes).
test.q_read_labels: I buy food paying attention to nutritional labels (e.g., sugar, fat content).
test.q_eat_fast: I often eat very quickly, hardly chewing and not really tasting the food.
test.q_drink_water: I drink at least 6–8 glasses of water daily (not including tea or coffee).
test.q_choose_eco: When choosing food, it is important to me that it is organic or natural.
test.q_emotional_eating: I often eat when I feel stressed, bored, or emotional.
test.q_mood_affects_eating: My eating depends on my mood or how busy I am.
test.q_social_overeat: I tend to eat more or less healthy food when I'm with others or during celebrations.
test.q_restrict_binge: Some days I consciously restrict my food, and then overeat later.
test.q_feel_guilt: I feel guilty if I eat something I consider unhealthy.
test.q_eat_fast_food: I often eat food that is quick to prepare (e.g., frozen products, ready meals).
test.q_drink_sugary: I consume sugary soft drinks (e.g., cola, sprite).
test.q_eat_with_screens: I often eat while watching TV, using a computer, or phone.
test.q_eat_outside: I often eat out (e.g., in cafes, restaurants, or fast-food places).
test.q_think_fast_food_ok: I think fast food (e.g., kebab, pizza, burgers) is healthy enough if eaten in moderation.
test.q_taste_over_nutrition: When choosing food, taste is more important to me than nutritional value.
test.q_think_healthy_hard: I think healthy eating is too expensive or too complicated.
test.q_mindless_eating: I often eat automatically, without noticing the taste or how much I've eaten.
test.q_think_balanced: I think my diet is sufficiently balanced and healthy.
test.q_take_supplements: I take food supplements (e.g., vitamins, protein powders).
test.q_boredom_eating: I often eat out of boredom, even when I'm not hungry.
test.q_snacking_unplanned: I often snack unplanned between main meals.
test.q_appearance_over_nutrition: I often choose food based on appearance rather than nutrition.
test.q_fail_diet_plans: I often try to follow a diet but quickly return to old habits.
test.successMessage: Well done! Your answers were successfully saved.

test.sportIntroText: Answer the questions to help us understand your exercise style and preferences. This helps create the best plan for you.
test.q_endurance_general: I enjoy general endurance training (e.g., long runs, cycling, swimming).
test.q_strength_general: I prefer general strength training with weights.
test.q_cardio_activities: I enjoy cardio activities (running, aerobics, cycling).
test.q_high_reps_lighter_weights: I prefer doing higher repetitions with lighter weights.
test.q_short_sprints: I prefer short, intense sprint workouts.
test.q_interval_training: I enjoy interval training (combining cardio and strength).
test.q_flexibility_stretching: I dedicate significant time to stretching exercises.
test.q_mobility_focus: Improving my body's mobility and flexibility is important to me.
test.q_team_sports: I enjoy participating in team sports.
test.q_solo_training: I usually prefer to train alone.
test.q_personal_challenges: I enjoy setting personal fitness challenges.
test.q_upper_body_focus: I often focus on upper body training.
test.q_lower_body_focus: I focus more on training my lower body.
test.q_core_strength_importance: Having a strong core (abdominal area) is important to me.
test.q_balanced_training: I aim for balanced training of all body parts.
test.q_gym_training: I frequently train in a gym.
test.q_home_training: I regularly work out at home.
test.q_training_variety: I like having variety in my workouts.
test.q_structured_routine: I follow a clear and structured workout plan.
test.q_consistent_training: I train regularly, without long breaks.
test.q_longer_less_intense_sessions: I prefer longer, less intense workout sessions.
test.q_daily_physical_activity: I try to be physically active every day.

info.sportsHabitsTest: This test helps assess your workout preferences, physical strengths and weaknesses, and your psychological profile for training. Answer each question from 1 to 5, where 1 means 'strongly disagree' and 5 means 'strongly agree'.
form.dateInputHelper: Enter your date of birth: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD
form.invalidCalendarDate: Such date does not exist in the calendar
form.dateCannotBeFuture: Date cannot be in the future
pleaseLogin: Please log in to view your workouts.
